skill.name: behaviors.skills.Demonstrate
skill.description:
For the crowd agent, to reach a given detination and begin to demontrate (the agent moves toward the issued destination and begins to demonstrate when arrived).
The demonstration is represented by an interaction with nearby agents which intensity depends on the crowd attitude: - calm or agitated: low intensity ( 0.01) - excited or agressive : high intensity (1)

link.name: moveTo
link.description: To enact the decision of moving toward the destination.

link.name: demonstrate
link.description: To enact the decision of desmonstrating once the destination is reached.
